text: Border czar Tom Homan says 700 ICE and CBP officers are leaving Minneapolis - The Washington Post

text: Asian Stocks to Fall as Tech-Led Drop Gains Pace: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com

text: Intelligence director Tulsi Gabbard’s office obtained and tested voting machines in Puerto Rico - CNN
